amendment.description: Amendment sought to remove the Secretary's authority to delegate an observer to attend meetings of the board of directors of any assisted institution.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 in House Report 111-3 to remove the Secretary's authority to delegate an observer to attend meetings of the board of directors of any assisted institution.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 151 - 274 (Roll no. 20).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Hensarling.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 151 - 274 (Roll no. 20).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
